1.text: Whisk the flour, cornmeal, garlic powder, and salt in a bowl.

2.text: Blend 8 tablespoons (115 g) of butter into the dry mixture.

3.text: Stir in up to 1⁄2 cup (120 ml) of water to form a soft dough.

4.text: Process 1 cup (226 g) of shredded cheese until it's finely crumbled.

5.text: Mix the cheese into the dough until it's incorporated.

6.text: Cover the dough with plastic wrap and chill it for 2 hours.

7.text: Preheat the oven to 350 °F (177 °C) and line a baking sheet with parchment paper.

8.text: Roll the dough into 2 in (5.1 cm) long pieces.

9.text: Arrange the cheetos on the baking sheet.

10.text: Bake the cheetos for 15 to 20 minutes.

11.text: Transfer the warm cheetos to a bowl.

12.text: Put all of the ingredients into a small bowl.

14.text: Coat cheetos with the flamin' hot seasoning and the powdered cheese.
